last_episode_to_air.name: The Tenth Meal
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tensions at the mall finally come to head, and the group makes a discovery which could provide answers about the origins of the mist.

name: The Mist
overview: A small town family is torn apart by a brutal crime. As they deal with the fallout an eerie mist rolls in, suddenly cutting them off from the rest of the world, and in some cases, each other.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: When the residents of Bridgeville, Maine find themselves engulfed by a foreboding mist containing a myriad of inexplicable and bizarre threats, their humanity is put to the test. What will people do to survive when blinded by fear?

episodes.name: Withdrawal
episodes.overview: The Mist has settled over town as Eve, Alex, and other mallgoers try to manage the rising panic. Meanwhile, Kevin, Adrian, Mia, and Jonah venture out into the mist to get to Kevin's family.

episodes.name: Show and Tell
episodes.overview: At the church, Connor locks up Mia, Jonah and Kevin in the basement. Back at the mall, Jay confronts Alex to try and convince her he didn't rape her.

episodes.name: Pequod
episodes.overview: Kevin, Mia, Jonah, and Adrian arrive at an abandoned gas station where Kevin tries to reason with Clay amid fears of the wherabouts of his child. At the mall bookstore, Alex comes face to face with the Mist.

episodes.name: The Waiting Room
episodes.overview: Kevin and the others reach the hospital, where Kevin has an unexpected and painful encounter with his brother, Mike.

episodes.name: The Devil You Know
episodes.overview: At the hospital, Kevin becomes an involuntary test subject on what drives the Mist; after Nathalie discusses her theories about "The Black Spring," she has a violent encounter with Link.

episodes.name: Over the River and Through the Woods
episodes.overview: The gang finds unlikely sanctuary in the psych wing of the hospital; tensions at the mall escalate about the remaining food rations; Nathalie and Romanov have a final confrontation.

episodes.name: The Law of Nature
episodes.overview: Nathalie gains full control of the remaining parishioners; at the mall, Alex and Jay continue to grow closer until Eve intervenes; Adrian and the gang make a stop at Adrian's home; Kevin makes a shocking discovery.

episodes.name: The Waking Dream
episodes.overview: Adrian, Mia and Jonah return with somber news; an enraged Kevin heads toward the mall with Vic; the group at the mall turns on Alex and Eve.

episodes.name: The Tenth Meal
episodes.overview: Tensions at the mall finally come to head, and the group makes a discovery which could provide answers about the origins of the mist.
